post.desc:
Shō's hair is an interesting case 🤔 It seems a lot of artists render her hair out as just shaggy, while another lot almost don't bother with that detail at all.

Personally, I prefer the other side of the spectrum, which would be closer to how the original sprite looks – you can tell the locks apart. For instance, [**Mizutaki**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/File:LEShou.png) (Lotus Eaters).
